context: Mid-sized utility company evaluating $50M investment in smart grid infrastructure to improve reliability and reduce outage times

request.purpose: Smart grid infrastructure upgrade including sensors, automation, and predictive maintenance systems
request.justification: Reduce average outage time from 120 minutes to 45 minutes, improve service reliability to 99.9% uptime

decision_process.outcome: Feasible with projected 15% ROI over 10 years
Approved with mixed financing (40% debt, 60% equity)
Approved with conditions for customer rate protection

business_impact.expected_outcome: Improved service reliability, reduced operational costs, enhanced customer satisfaction

lessons_learned: Early regulatory engagement critical for infrastructure projects, comprehensive risk assessment improves approval confidence, customer impact communication enhances stakeholder support
